Oct. 22, 1886 D Edinburgh International Exhibition Contest
Edinburgh International Exhibition Contest (Scottish Section) 0 Other Edinburgh International Exhibition Contest edinburgh-international-exhibition-contest-sc-1153
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK Open to Scottish Bands only. Prizes: £30, £20, £15, £10, £5. 10 bands competed.
Dec. 29, 2011, 9:37 p.m. Feb. 8, 2018, 9:05 p.m.
1 1st Clackmannan and Kinross Rifle Volunteers James Jenkins Rossini's Works
2 Coatbridge Burgh William H. Cole William Tell [unknown arranger]
3 Monklands Youth Concert Brass Charles E. Murdoch Stiffelio [unknown arranger]
4 Alloa Burgh James Jenkins Heroic
5 Hawick Saxhorn Band Walter Thorburn Verdi's Works [arr. W. Rimmer]
5 Bonnybridge & District James Jenkins William Tell [unknown arranger]
Unknown Result Townhill Silver James Carmichael Moses in Egypt [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Langholm Town William Calvert Ernani [unknown arranger]
Unknown Result Dr Guthrie's Industrial School Unknown Scottish Melodies
Unknown Result Galashiels Town Wesley Johnstone The Bohemian Girl [arr. Round]
